Standards for Enterprise IT Service Delivery:
The delivery of the following enterprise services will comply with the entitlements and limitations specified in these documents:
Application Hosting Considerations and Restrictions

Standards for Networking and Cabling Services are as follows:
Ensure that local Internet access services are obtained through SSC; Departments are responsible for all costs for supplying these services to users; and Guest Wi-Fi must be provided wherever GC Wi-Fi is available.

Standards for Telephony Services are as follows:
Telephony plans can be purchased for automated devices that require connectivity; and
Fixed lines are permitted for:
Requirements specified in AppendixÂ E: Standard on Information Technology Provisions ;
Emergency response or business continuity; and
Where cellular coverage is prohibited or not available.

Standards for Printing Services are as follows:
No more than one printer for every 250 users.

Standards for Workplace Technology Device Services are as follows:
There is to be at least two web browsers installed on each end-user device.
